title: PbE Acount

replies.body:
Don´t worry Alvin, i play since season 1 and dont get accpeted on PbE

You are not alone ;) 


It's only a matter of time ^_^

That's really cool your friend got accepted into the PBE and that you've played for so long!  We can't really force or expedite PBE applications, though.  I don't have any information on acceptance beyond our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ), so all I can really suggest is to be patient!  Good luck with your application!

Hello i want to know how i can get a pbe acc.
I'm playing from season 3 and i want it so much
